data.eml:eml: Taxonomic revision of the monotypic genus Psellonus Simon, 1897 (Araneae, Philodromidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Malamel, Jobi J., Nafin, Karunnappilli Shamsudheen, Sankaran, Pradeep M., Sebastian, Pothalil A. (2019): Taxonomic revision of the monotypic genus Psellonus Simon, 1897 (Araneae, Philodromidae). Zootaxa 4543 (3): 442-450, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4543.3.9
